website_summaries.verdict: A relatively low-cost monitor that has bright colors and brilliant resolution – and also includes VGA and DVI cables.
pros: buttons on front of monitor vs. on the side
Gets high marks among users for contrast and vibrancy, and for anti-glare surface
Widescreen provides more viewing space with no eyestrain, even after several hours of work
cons: Some users find the stand a bit more wobbly than previous versions

customer_reviews.title: Not purchasing Acer again.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for about two years, and did have some problems with it switching off about six months ago. But it came back, so I thought it was just one of those things. But now I’ve gotten a new MacBook Pro (nothing wrong with it), and when I plug it in blue is pink. That’s with Acer settings, but can’t fix it in custom color settings either. I see other Acer’s in the list of Amazon approved monitors. I realize I’ve had it over the warranty, but I wouldn’t purchase another of this brand. Of course I won’t buy HP either because HP plays a key role in Israel’s oppression of Palestinians. The field gets more limited.
customer_reviews.author: P. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. I had done my research at an electronic store so I know the picture quality was going to be great. Delivery was ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd Acer normally get Dell but did not want to spend the money just for a second screen. This is perfect great price and service. Was disappointed no HMDI OR USB to hook up to my chrome book for work.. but for the price I just ordered it cable. The monitor look great. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: TAMPA

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor even better for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have played with the colors, I have an old dell ultra sharp 24 which is really old and still awesome that's my benchmark. I'll still messing with tone but this one gets really close and amazon warehouse for seventy two dollars no brainer. I had an HP 22 inch that lasted a couple years and just died. This one is bigger and a better monitor but it does take some time right out of the box to dial in properly.
customer_reviews.author: clearanceman

customer_reviews.title: 2 seemed to work fine. 1 had weird blurry movements when scrolling and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 for different computers. 2 seemed to work fine. 1 had weird blurry movements when scrolling and playing games. Great for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitors, I have 6 of these on 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Monitors, I have 6 of these on 3 systems, Granted we don't play any high intense graphics games, but for All other tasks as mundane as Word, and Excel. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TVWatcher

customer_reviews.title: Lacks HDMI Port
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was suggested as a replacement for another Acer monitor I ordered and wanted to match for my second monitor. Upon receipt, I noticed it lacked an HDMI port. Partially my fault for not verifying before purchase, however, responsibility also rests with the seller for not recommending a like/like item, especially when recommendation was pricier. Product meets needs and works otherwise after additional purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Smith

customer_reviews.title: The upgrade I needed at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a bigger monitor for the things I do on my PC with includes everyday docs and programs, photo editing, and streaming TV. I quick checked specs against others in this price range and it was right in line so it seemed a good value. The shipment arrived 2 days early and I have enjoyed using this monitor every day since. good picture, response etc. nothing earth shattering just a good 24" monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Castellon

customer_reviews.title: These are just fine. Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a standard desktop monitor... To just do regular work on... these are perfect. I don't know that I would game on them or try detailed graphics however for general use they are great. I do wish I would have checked... as they have no USB ports on them to contact any other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Larums

customer_reviews.title: NO HDMI or DisplayPort connections
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared. They actually ship this monitor with a VGA cable. VGA and DVI, same as monitors I bought dog years ago. Really? Whyyyyyyyyyy?
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Can't as for better
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a dying 24" and this did the trick. I have had a lot of Acer products and liked them all. This monitor has great color and fast refresh for my purposes. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas G. Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: It's a good monitor. Don't expect it to give you the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good monitor. Don't expect it to give you the best picture quality ever, nor should you expect that it is terrible. If you need another monitor for viewing spreadsheets, youtube, etc on, then this a very responsible option.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C. Crabbe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are a steal at the price. I bought about 40 of them and have had them in the field for around a year with no failures. Didn't get a bad one out of 40 which is hard to believe.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Started Making Noise
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this year (2018), worked fine out of box, but now it now emits a noise - like a cooling fan is going out on it or something (buzzing noise). Wish i could get a replacement but alas it looks like i'm out hundreds on this monitor. Find another monitor, they shouldn't have issues within 1 year like I am experiencing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Music software: color accuracy not important, but I would also use for graphic arts.
customer_reviews.author: mick hanson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up Great picture quality Nice
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Pros: Easy to set up Great picture quality Nice, wide screen Cons: You cannot raise or lower monitor, only tilt Overall: I would buy another Acer monitor, but would spend the extra money for the ability to completely adjust my screen height. Didn't think it would be such a big deal, but it is.
customer_reviews.author: M. Grauer

customer_reviews.title: There are no HDMI Ports, why this product is discontinued
customer_reviews.text: Got the monitor and found out no HDMI Ports. Returned immediately. Old technology why this is been discontinued by ACER.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: I smashed my old one on purpose, I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: I smashed my old one on purpose, I don't know what it is about buying two of everything but it's making me mad, that it's all grace of first going in thirds.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas R Forystek

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, bad stand
customer_reviews.text: The display is, serves it's purpose well. But the stand is flimsy. Other than that though, good monitor
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great 2nd Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this monitor as a second monitor for my wife while she works from home. Not using as a gaming monitor but the picture is adequate enough to be used as such. Great Monitor if your looking for a low cost, good picture quality in a multiple monitor setup.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Woltenberg

customer_reviews.title: What an upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this monitor......way better then I expected
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lefkow

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up with the docking station and small lap top to make working from home better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great clarity and quality!
customer_reviews.text: The screen clarity is great, the size is perfect, and I can't wait to have them both set up so I can finally have dual monitors!
customer_reviews.author: April L

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This computer monitor is excellent. Picture quality is great, and the anti glare screen is a huge plus. I am considering purchasing another so I can run a dual screen setup.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good monitors. We bought 12 here at work and they are all fine.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Houston

customer_reviews.title: As security monitor on 24/7 - works well
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a replacement security monitor. It is working very well so far and has a good image running 24/7. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: I can rate this

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, inexpensive 1080P monitor for general use. If you aren't gaming, this is a great option
customer_reviews.author: Roger W. Meinert

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor. The bezel is rather large, its not exactly the nicest looking monitor. But the size and quality of the picture is nice, and for the price its hard to say no to this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Heidt

customer_reviews.title: Good price, but...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this is not HDMI compatible. It comes with DVI and VGA. I wish that was made clear in the Amazon listing.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly - beautiful images, easy to read -I work 9 hours ...
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly - beautiful images, easy to read -I work 9 hours a day with this Monitor, no eye strain. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eon Farms

customer_reviews.title: Picture and color lies I tell ya
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s junk picture on screen is green and yes I tried sailing it in so disappointing from pic on amazon that show a life like photo is a lie
customer_reviews.author: Nathan j

customer_reviews.title: it is a nice size and picture is nice and clear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a birthday gift to my sister. it is a nice size and picture is nice and clear. a great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, buy it..you'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product. Everything it said it was and more. I dearly love it. Very easy to assemble and set up.
customer_reviews.author: mouse

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 19" monitor. Easy to install and the picture is clear and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Glinda

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Works great for my office, didn't need anything fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwigirl

customer_reviews.title: I like the relatively small flat base that doesn't take too ...
customer_reviews.text: Display quality as expected. I like the relatively small flat base that doesn't take too much of my desk space. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AUSCHNUSA

customer_reviews.title: Very nice monitor for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitor for the money. I bought it for work and am typing this review on it right now.
customer_reviews.author: MITCH SMITH

customer_reviews.title: This is a great display if you do not have to pack it back up to move.
customer_reviews.text: This screen is nice. I dropped a star because once it is assembled, it won't disassemble to be put back in the box. Not many displays will do this.
customer_reviews.author: CableXF

customer_reviews.title: We have more than 2,000 of these monitors at my job, and have very few problems with them.
customer_reviews.text: I do not use this monitor for gaming so I have no comment but the monitor works great for viewing CAD drawings any type of documents and general PC work
customer_reviews.author: John Q

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Great picture. If it had speakers and a tuner I would have a great TV too. I have since purchase an extra cable so that I can use it when I have my laptop at home (to give my eyes a break).
customer_reviews.author: Linwood Stalls

customer_reviews.title: Monitors felt solid and performed great!
customer_reviews.text: Packed well. Came with the DVI cord which is very convenient. Monitors felt solid and performed great!
customer_reviews.author: DEREK O.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor to match the same one I already had. Now using dual monitors. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the picture-quality sucks. I purchased this to use in my home-office
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! I'm returning this monitor. There isn't an HDMI port or audio jacks. The manual indicates the HDMI and all other connections are "optional"... hmmmm. Silly-me for assuming it would have what should be standard for 2017, and for not reading the negative reviews (I purchased because of the 4+-star rating). And if that isn't bad-enough, the picture-quality sucks. I purchased this to use in my home-office, connecting to my laptop; the picture-quality on my laptop is far better. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Blanche Devereaux

customer_reviews.title: image is decent but not great..
customer_reviews.text: does not have usb or other ports... image is decent but not great... plus the push button controls are impossible to figure out...
customer_reviews.author: joshua m harris

customer_reviews.title: Great monitors
customer_reviews.text: Bought two to use together. Worked great but wish they had HDMI connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my home office and both have the same color
customer_reviews.author: gs7734

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: got product on time and in good order. works great ! thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One is working very well and the clarity is great. The other has been consistently blurry, wavy, or slow to refresh since installation. I'm not sure exactly how to describe the visual / image issue but I've tried changing cables, connection outlets etc and one monitor is always fine and the other one always visually faulty - to the point where it gives me a headache and I turn it off. So, effectively I'm back to just one monitor at double the price. :-(
customer_reviews.author: M. Bulloch

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 of these now. Good size and they work good.
customer_reviews.author: Brad J.

customer_reviews.title: Have had these monitors for a few months now and ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had these monitors for a few months now and no complaints for picture or general quality. I use them for general office work and computing coding.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: ... was able to hook both monitors and they are great. I am so excite about my office
customer_reviews.text: I want to say I was a little concern at first being there was no HDMI out put but I was able to hook both monitors and they are great. I am so excite about my office. This was a great buy. I would buy this monitor again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for static images
customer_reviews.text: Good Value for static images. Don't buy this expecting to game on it. The refresh rate is too slow, but that's to be expected on lower priced monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Rice

customer_reviews.title: Received order quickly. Was a gift for our son ...
customer_reviews.text: Received order quickly. Was a gift for our son at Christmas and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Green

customer_reviews.title: John
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months now and it is great. Perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: John McJoynt

customer_reviews.title: He is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this monitor for my husband. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J Trushell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a good monitor. No problems so far and overall I had good luck with Acer products.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, definitely big enough for gaming, very clear display, and shipped extremely fast. Great choice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Budget Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Plus: Great value. Fast shipping. Quality image without bleed. Minus: Little height adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice priced screen. I am running doubles of these. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: John Raigney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works well and is a very good size if you want a bit larger than the average screen.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Reed

customer_reviews.title: Missing M4X8 Hex screws X 2
customer_reviews.text: Wish all the parts would have been in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Asheville Endocinology

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for less than 45 days - never again
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Snyder

customer_reviews.title: No HDMI/DISPLAY port!!, can VGA to HDMI be used?
customer_reviews.text: I received the monitor yesterday. It doesn't have either hdmi or display port. Does anybody know if VGA to HDMI converters are efficient in data conversion? If yes, I will skip returning it. Thanks in advance.
customer_reviews.author: Pavan

customer_reviews.title: A Faulty Unit
customer_reviews.text: A very blurry picture. The default setting was so bright you would had to close your eyes or look away. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sweets

customer_reviews.title: Works great and inside the box it's launch resistant
customer_reviews.text: Works great and inside the box it's launch resistant, because when it was delivered to me the person just threw it over the fence, but luckily nothing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael P.

customer_reviews.title: ... be a viewsonic only person but i am in love with Acer monitors for price/performance ratio
customer_reviews.text: I use to be a viewsonic only person but i am in love with Acer monitors for price/performance ratio!
customer_reviews.author: tim haywood

customer_reviews.title: Great size for spreadsheets and working in two different programs ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size for spreadsheets and working in two different programs on one screen. I have two of these monitors set up side by side!! Perfect for my line of work where I have multiple programs open! LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnn W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Acer makes great monitors for business use, good quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ranthar

customer_reviews.title: Only had this monitor for 5 months, now it ...
customer_reviews.text: Only had this monitor for 5 months, now it just dies after a few minutes. I have to unplug the power, then wait 10 minutes for 30 seconds of screen time. I'm not looking forward to the warranty process of shipping it to them.
customer_reviews.author: Jong K

customer_reviews.title: Got delivered a smaller Acer monitor
customer_reviews.text: I got delivered a different Acer monitor, V246HQL 23.6", not the one described. Doesn't seem like a lot, but does make a difference. When contacting seller/Amazon about my concern, I was told I received the correct monitor, but could return it if not satisfied. Oh well, I give 4 stars for monitor performance and quality, but 2 stars for a screen size smaller than stated. So that gives me the 3 star review. I will keep it rather than go thru the return process. Here is the monitor you might get. Nice, and actually selling for more than this listed one.
customer_reviews.author: nichole

customer_reviews.title: Once I unplug and replug it works fine. I have the same setup with some Dell ...
customer_reviews.text: The monitors have been ok, at least once a day we have to reconnect the cable to the multi port monitor device we have because the monitors go on the blink and do not display well. Once I unplug and replug it works fine. I have the same setup with some Dell monitors and never have the issue. I even switched out the multi port monitor devices and get the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No HDMI on this model
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have an HDMI port on this model. The manual says it's optional. Obviously this deal doesn't come with the HDMI model.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, I had to return it because I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I had to return it because I didn't see there is no Display Port on this. This day and age, every monitor should have that. So it's my own fault for not seeing that up front, however I believe it should be there.
customer_reviews.author: AZRanger308

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Monitor is mislabeled and the seller will not fix it. I sent them a message and they said I can return it. Part number matches to a 23.6" monitor but this is listed as a 24" monitor, so when you do a search for monitors 24" or greater it shows this smaller monitor.
customer_reviews.author: K. MacMillan

product_meta.title: Acer V246HQL 23.6-Inch Full HD LED Backlit Widescreen LCD Monitor
product_meta.description: Acer V246HQL CBD 23.6 inch Widescreen 100,000,000:1 5ms/ VGA/ DVI LED LCD Monitor (Black)- 1920 x 1080, 16:9 LED Backlight Monitor Product dimensions: 13.2 inches x 22.3 inches x 2.4 inches (without stand) 16.58 inches x 22.32 inches x 8.14 inches (with stand). Viewing Angles 170 Degrees Horizontal, 160 Degrees Vertical.
